title: Love Island Australia: Gerard Majda strips off for NAKED photoshoot in the villa
text:
Love Island's Gerard Majda isn't afraid to get his kit off.

And the personal trainer has taken the opportunity to flaunt his chiseled physique yet again as he stripped off for a nude photoshoot in the villa.

The 23-year-old Perth lad treated the fellow islanders to a glimpse of his pert derriere as he posed around the pool.

Using an inflatable rubber ring to cover his modesty, Gerard was determined to get the photo just right.

He roped fellow islander Josh Packham into the role of photographer and stylist as he maneuvered the love heart shaped inflatable to cover his genitals.

Careful not to expose himself to the cast and cameramen, Gerard looked pleased with himself as he struck a pose.

Risky! Careful not to expose himself to the cast and cameramen, Gerard looked pleased with himself as he struck a pose

'What about one with the butt in?' he asked, spinning round to give Josh a view of his bare cheeks.

Not satisfied with the one photo, Gerard then ditched the inflatable and lay down by the pool.

Stretched out along the edge, he flaunted his washboard abs and healthy glow, all while keeping his hand firmly over his private parts.

Cheeky! 'What about one with the butt in?' he asked, spinning round to give Josh a view of his bare bottom

'This is the pose,' he told Josh. 'This is the pose that got me on the show.'

But fellow islanders Matt Zukowski and Eoghan Murphy looked bemused as they watched Gerard's efforts.

'You're missing a little oomph,' Matt said, as the rest of the boys gave Gerard some artistic direction.

Gerard seized his opportunity to strip off while the female islanders were away during Tuesday's episode.

Before going on Love Island Australia, the Instagram personality regularly posed in the buff for social media.
description: Love Island's Gerard Majda (pictured) isn't afraid to get his kit off.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
